ys.probabilistic.util

Class AggregateLinearCounter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ys.probabilistic.util.AggregateLinearCounter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of values being counted
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinearCounter<T>

    public class AggregateLinearCounter<T>
extends Object
implements LinearCounter<T>
    A LinearCounter that aggregates results from other linear counters. It doesn't count values itself. The implementation is not thread safe.
    Author:
    Yauheni Shahun
